      • register

        public static ConnectionHandler register(String id,
                         ConnectionHandler handler)
        Registers a connection handler.
        Parameters:
        id - Handler unique ID
        handler - Connection handler
        Returns:
        Handler previously registered for |id|, or null if none
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if |id| or |handler| is null (or empty)
        See Also:
        unregister(java.lang.String)
